title: T206 Dubuc SGC50 for sale or trade
author: Northviewcats

posts.post_title: T206 Dubuc SGC50 for sale or trade
posts.post_content:
I have doubles of this Jean Dubuc card. Would be willing to trade for a similarly graded T206 that I don't already own (I still need about 250 cards to complete the set), or sell outright for $50.00. TRADED. THANKS

Thanks for looking,

Joe

I can use him. I have a dup McElveen SGC 50 if you need him.

[url]jacklitsch@comcast.net[/url]

Hello Steve,

Thanks for the offer, but I already have a nice McElveen. I'm sending you a list of the cards that I do have (I should have posted this in the first place, but I'm worried about taking up too much space). If you have any cards that I don't have I would be willing to trade. The cards without an x and a description are the cards I need. If anyone else would like a copy of the list let me know.

Best wishes,

Joe
Hi Joe, I have a dupe Frank Smith SGC 50 - if you have that as well, can you send me your list.?  Thanks, Ed (edwolf1963@aol.com)

Hello Ed,

I have the F. Smith Chicago version, but I don't have the white cap. I also sent you my list of cards that I do not have, in case there is another card that would fit the bill. Let me know.

Thanks,

Joe
